name: team-genius-boy-friends-things-that-make-us-laugh
title: Team Genius: Boy Friends [Things That Make Us Laugh]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded: We’ve got more funny people for you. They call themselves Team Genius, and they do music videos, improv, and a Flight-of-the-Conchords-esque video series called Boy Friends. It makes us laugh, and we love recognizing the random places around Nashville that they film. This one is our favorite, and we think that anyone who has ever done a doubletake at the storefronts on Broadway will appreciate it.
